altername_name: MTV's Beavis and Butt-Head: Virtual Aho Shoukougun
MTV's Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity
name: Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity
overview: Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity is a point-and-click adventure based on MTV's Beavis & Butt-Head series. The player can control both characters as they attempt to join Todd's gang. Much of the gameplay consists of inventory-based puzzles. There are also a few mini-games and hidden music videos. It was originally released on the PC. A CD-i port of Virtual Stupidity was planned, but was cancelled due to falling sales of the console. A Sony PlayStation port was released exclusively in Japan in 1998 with dubbed voice acting by Owarai duo London Boots Ichi-gō Ni-gō.
